title: Darning Sampler, 1839
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cross stitch embroidery, multiple darning stitches
provenance:
Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased though Mrs. Wiltbank, 1924. 
(M No. 28, CG no. 45);  2002 appraisal #65
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Sampler of nine different darning weaves in blue, green and yellow on white linen, with four cross stitch floral wreaths and numerous sets of initials in red cross stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Darning Sampler, 1839.
1839. Medium: linen
Technique: cross stitch embroidery, multiple darning stitches. Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers. 2003-14-23.
